summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5441 for the improvement of 24th Avenue Southwest, from a point approximately 211 feet north of West Oregon Street, to West Juneau Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 68506 as amended by Ordinance No. 68757, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
